_notes: Built from Group 4 Platinum Skills by Week spreadsheet.
Scenario/activity content not yet populated — no EMT weekly spreadsheets parsed.
Run EMT weekly spreadsheets through the lab parser to populate station scenario content.
Key structural features from Platinum data:
- batch_graded: skill signed off for whole group in that session
- signoff_week: when final Platinum sign-off occurs (may be later than week taught)
- signoff_note: 'student_dependent' = sign off when individual achieves competency; 'capstone_only' = no teaching week, first appears at capstone
- requires_two_instructors: station requires 2 instructors present for valid sign-off
- deferred: skill taught early but sign-off deliberately held to later week
NREMT practical exam runs in-house with SNHD authorization — no external observer.
Weeks 9-10 have no Platinum skills documented — scenario/activity content pending from weekly spreadsheets.

stations.format_notes: Orientation to EMT program, lab facilities, equipment locations, Platinum portal introduction. No skill sign-offs Week 1.

stations.scenario_title: NREMT Practical — In-House with SNHD Authorization
stations.format_notes: NREMT practical exam runs entirely in-house with SNHD authorization. No external observers. Program has SNHD trust relationship — replaced previous external observation model. Confirm SNHD authorization current before scheduling. Scenario content and station design pending from weekly spreadsheets and NREMT practical documentation.
